alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 31 at 2:31AM MDT until March 31 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Blizzard conditions late this afternoon and early evening for south-central South Dakota... .A strong winter storm will bring heavy snow across southern South Dakota today. Strong gusty northerly winds will develop this afternoon with the highest speeds (above 50 MPH) over south- central South Dakota as blizzard conditions develop. Travel will be very difficult where warning are in place today. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Jackson County and Bennett County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice will make travel very hazardous or impossible. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
